message.raw:
Initial implementation (completely UNTESTED) of gated clocks

The pulseblaster should now be able to have it's fast clock duplicated across multiple flags.
Each fast clock flag can have independent sets of devices on it.
During ramps, only clock flags with ramping outputs will have the clock tick.

This, in theory, allows you to connect multiple devices to your fast clock (via different flags), but not burn instructions on devices with constant output when others are ramping.

As mentioned above, this code has never been used to compile any labscript and likely contains several bugs.
